front.title: Path Computation Element (PCE) Communiation Protocol Requirements

abstract.t: Constraint-based path computation is a fundamental building block fortraffic engineering systems such as MPLS and GMPLS networks. Pathcomputation in large, multi-domain or multi-layer networks is highlycomplex and may require special computational components and cooperationbetween the different network domains.This document specifies the communication protocol requirements for aPath Computation Element (PCE)-based model.
